idea-plugin.name: Buttress
idea-plugin.description:
Provide one-click code template generation functionality for IntelliJ IDEs and Android Studio.

Features

  • In theory, applicable to all languages
  • Customizable addition of template code
  • Code template support for class names and package names
  • Ability to directly preview and modify template code
  • Preview file structure to be created
